tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES yoga_equipment(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE yoga_mats (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE yoga_blocks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    material VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE yoga_straps (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    color VARCHAR(50),
    length VARCHAR(20),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);
